thig13.4:5.2: sataputtāni → satta puttāni (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thig13.4:10.1: Tassa → tassāhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed) | brahme → brāhmaṇa (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thig13.4:15.4: pabbaji → pabbajito (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
